Preterit.turoyo: húwwal-le mandilo, mkaseleruḥe w-azzé 414; 43/22; mkaselafoṯa d-l-oḏaʕ-la u=paša 415; prs 148/32; ḥbǝ́šle-legurtale w mkasyole b-qaršo 415; prs 63/13;
translations: gave him a [bath] towel, he covered himself [with it] and went

Infectum.turoyo: l-ḥeḏər i=walayaṯṯe u=ṭarškə-mkaseʕayne d-u=yawmo w ax=xaymoṯe w ar=rawixe 419; 53/11; ṣaʕra ko-mkaseḥaṣa 419; 75/55; gə-mkasət i=gurtodə-kt-owəteba b-u=qaršo b-aṭ=ṭarfe
translations: das Auge der Sonne und die
hole in which you will be with hay and leaves’ 75/289;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: gə-mkasyó-way-no-le g-maḥtó-way-no u=qalpāġaʕla, w tre=ǧulehawxa g-kunfó-way-no əmmó-way-no d-lo=ǧoməd
translations: I covered it (rennet extract, m.), put a lid on it (cauldron, f.) and wrapped it with two shawls in order for it not to get cold’

Imperativ.turoyo: sum nuqro, kasáyruḥox b-qaršo 422; prs 198/36; prs 216/31;

Part. Pass..turoyo: kleqarʕe d-u=dewomkasyo b-u=qaršo 424; prs 216/33; u=qarʕomkasyo b-u=sáwko-yo 3/2;
